channel.title: Case 299: (Need help with portal requirements!)
channel.description:
I need to know how to make level requirements for a portal, if you know please share. Also, if you have the skill ID's that would help alot to.
[b]If you flame/spam/[/b] on this post, i will get very pissed. [b]haticks[/b] is not welcome to post on this thread. And if you've read my earlier posts you'll know why.

item.title: Case 299: (Need help with portal requirements!)
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

case ####: if(playerLevel[#] >= ##) { /*Stuff you want in here.*/ } else if(playerLevel[#] < ##){ /*other stuff thats not the required level in here*/ } break;

Read full topic
